mapper.sql: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DbT3017_1."hiHokenshaNo" order by DbT3017_1."shinsaYM_1" DESC) AS "rank_number" FROM ( SELECT *, (CASE WHEN DbT3017."shinsaYM" = '' THEN '999999' ELSE DbT3017."shinsaYM" END) AS "shinsaYM_1" FROM rgdb."DbT3017KyufujissekiKihon" AS DbT3017 WHERE DbT3017."serviceTeikyoYM" = #{serviceTeikyoYM} AND DbT3017."kyufuSakuseiKubunCode" != '3' AND substring(DbT3017."inputShikibetsuNo" from 0 for 4) NOT IN ( '71P','816','71R','817' ) ) AS DbT3017_1 ) AS DbT3017_2 WHERE rank_number = 1

SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT3017KyufujissekiKihon" AS DbT3017 WHERE DbT3017."shinsaYM" = #{sinsaYM} AND DbT3017."kyufuSakuseiKubunCode" != '3' AND substring(DbT3017."inputShikibetsuNo" from 0 for 4) NOT IN ( '71P','816','71R','817' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "DbKyufujissekiTemp" AS tmpKyufujisseki WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY tmpKyufujisseki."hiHokenshaNo", tmpKyufujisseki."serviceTeikyoYM", tmpKyufujisseki."yoKaigoJotaiKubunCode"

select.id: get処理結果確認リスト作成
